about_the_game:
DLC purchase also unlocks this character and scene inside SinVR 2: Forbidden World

WINTER IS CUMMING


The dragon's daughter's dreams come true.
She would burn her enemies, just to have you.
When she stepped into the fire, her own people thought she was mad!
But is it so far, from madness to wisdom?

Take her like a slave, like a hound takes a bitch.
Destroy her defenses and eliminate all opposition!
Will you fight for her? Will you swear to her?
Then she finishes you, with nothing but her eyes.

SINFUL FEATURES

  • An interactive PC experience unlike any other!
  • 7 different sex positions
  • VR support for HTC Vive and Oculus Rift with Touch
  • Integrated with Fleshlight VStroker
  • Own her now, forever!

Bonus:
  • DLC character and scene is also unlocked for free inside SinVR 2: Forbidden World!
  • 'Mix and Match' to your heart's content!

content_descriptors.notes: SinVR features nudity, adult language, consensual sex and playful spanking.

name: SinVR - The Dragon Milf

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or greater
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 (AMD Radeon RX 480) or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The Dragon Milf will finish you with nothing but her eyes.
